translation.en: All right. We're good to go.
You got this? You bet your ass, bubba.
Mmm. Let's make some money!
Everyone in position.
Well, I thought we'd be robbin' banks by now,
translation.zh: 我还以为我们要抢银行

translation.en: not some gas truck in the middle of nowhere.
translation.zh:
而不是在这荒山野岭
的地方抢油罐车 在这 石油就是黄金

translation.en: Down here gas is gold, bubba.
translation.zh: 在这 石油就是黄金

translation.en: Give me that. [ Feedback Squeals ]
translation.zh:
每次你靠近银行
我们都要把你从牢里弄出来

translation.en: Kill the chatter! Game time.
I wouldn't piss him off, guys.
translation.zh: 我可不想惹恼他 伙计们

translation.en: ♪[ Continues ] [ Spanish ]
Okay, guys, we're gonna have to hit this hard and fast.
We got four "K" left before the downgrade. [ Horn Honks ]
Locked and loaded!
This is all you, Han.
Ha! Liquid gold. Ha-ha!
- We're clear. - Okay, T. You're up.
translation.zh: 我们搞定了 提戈 该你们了

translation.en: Let's see if you can get it under six tries this time, huh, T.?
translation.zh: 看看你6次以内能否搞定

translation.en: It's more like three. Come on, Tego. Keep it real.
translation.zh:
三次差不多 好啦
提戈 动真格的了

translation.en: There's one "K" left. We're running out of road.
translation.zh:
还剩1公里 前面没路了
动作快点 老弟

translation.en: Get in there, brother. Got it. I got it.
translation.zh:
还剩1公里 前面没路了
动作快点 老弟 明白

translation.en: Oh, shit!
T., cut loose! Unhitch! Unhitch!
- [ Screams ] - [ Mutters ]
- Spray that hitch! - I don't have a hammer!
Just do it!
- Hold on! Hold on! - No shit!
Hold on to something tight!
Letty! Give me your hand!
translation.zh:
莱蒂 –抓住我的手
–太远了

translation.en: I can't reach! You gotta jump!
translation.zh:
–抓住我的手
–太远了 你必须跳下来

translation.en: Jump!
Letty, jump!
I got you!
Dom.
Dom?
Dom!
- Oye, oye, oye, oye. - Hold it.
translation.zh:
–我的兄弟在机场当保安
–他说会有来几架运油机过来

translation.en: [ Spanish ] How you doin'?
Money, money!
Good.
- Yo, why your stack is bigger than mine always? - There you go.
translation.zh: 为什么你那一叠总比我的厚

translation.en: , ¿eh? - No, I'm supersized, baby. - Y tú qu
[ Spanish ] Okay. Hey, hey, man. Thank you.
Cops just raided our garage in Baracoa.
translation.zh: 警察突击了我们在巴拉科阿的修车厂

translation.en: They're real interested in you.
Heat's on, and we just sent up a flare that's gonna lead 'em right to us.
translation.zh: 我们刚刚又给他们留下了线索

translation.en: I say we move out first thing in the morning.
Nah, it's me they want.
translation.zh: 不 他们要抓的是我

translation.en: And if they catch me, they're throwin' big numbers at anybody with me.
translation.zh: 如果他们抓住我 他们会把与我有牵连的人都投入大牢

translation.en: Han, we had a good run.
Time for you to go do your own thing.
translation.zh: 你该去做些自己的事情了

translation.en: Heard they're doin' some crazy shit in Tokyo.
translation.zh: 听说他们在东京很疯狂

translation.en: You seen Letty?
There she is.
I hear Rio is nice this time of year.
translation.zh: 我听说里约每年这时候很美

translation.en: The cops are getting hungrier.
Then I guess we're doin' our job.
I'm a walking target.
I don't want you around when they catch up to me.
translation.zh: 我不想被抓住的时候让你受牵连

translation.en: "Ride or die," remember?
translation.zh: “不开车就去死” 还记得吗

translation.en: Dom, how long have we been doing this?
translation.zh: 多姆 我们干这行多久了

translation.en: And now all of a sudden, out of nowhere, it's too dangerous?
translation.zh: 突然之间 凭空就说这很危险了

translation.en: Come on.
We'll figure it out. We always do.
translation.zh: 我们能化险为夷的 一向如此

translation.en: I don't know shit! I don't know shit, man! Give me a name!
translation.zh:
–我什么都不知道
–告诉我他的名字 –我什么都不知道
–告诉我他的名字

translation.en: David Park! David Park's the guy you want!
translation.zh: 大卫·帕克 他就是你要找的人

translation.en: Please!
Oh, thank God. Listen, he's in a mood, because yesterday was his cheat day,
translation.zh:
听着 他没发火
因为昨天他偷懒没锻炼

translation.en: and then today some genius brought in doughnuts.
translation.zh: 今天 有人拿来了甜甜圈

translation.en: Oh, great.
Sorry I'm late. [ Door Closes ]
Complaints keep rolling in after your little downtown Olympics, O'Conner.
translation.zh: 你在市区闹运之后就投诉不断

translation.en: Tell me that reinstating you wasn't a mistake.
translation.zh: 告诉我给你复职不是错误

translation.en: - [ Typing ] - I got a name. David Park.
translation.zh:
–我拿到个名字 大卫·帕克
–就这个

translation.en: That's it? That's all you got? David Park?
I could throw a fortune cookie out this window and hit 50 David Parks right now.
translation.zh:
从这窗户扔出去块点心
能砸到50个大卫·帕克

translation.en: It's Korean, not Chinese. Whatever.
translation.zh:
–是韩国人 不是中国人
–随便

translation.en: Park is a scout that recruits street racers to be mules for the Braga cartel.
translation.zh: 帕克召集街头车手给布拉加运货

translation.en: We find Park, and we bust the bad guys.
translation.zh: 我们找到帕克 就能将他们一网打尽

translation.en: Mia, I told you not to call me here.
translation.zh: 多姆 米娅 我说过不要打到这里来

translation.en: Dom, it's Letty.
She's been murdered.
Brothers and sisters, we are gathered here to pay our final respects... to our beloved Letty.
translation.zh: 我们到这里作最后致意…

translation.en: Facial recognition software matched Toretto...
translation.zh: 面部识别程序在特伦托

translation.en: about 10 minutes after he crossed the border.
I don't get it.
Thought he'd show.
I told you not to come. They're staking the place out.
translation.zh: 我告诉你不要来的 他们在监视这里

translation.en: If they find you-- They won't.
Aw, come on. Look at you.
Letty wouldn't let them junk it.
translation.zh: 莱蒂不让他们处理掉它

translation.en: Even though it has a goddamn curse.
When she came back, she was always in here,
translation.zh: 她回来以后 就到这里

translation.en: working on it day and night.
It was weird.
It was like she knew you were coming back.
translation.zh: 就好像她知道你会回来

translation.en: I want to see the crash site.
I just got off the phone with Deputy Director Lawson.
translation.zh: 我刚和副局长通过电话

translation.en: If we don't make serious inroads into the Braga case in the next 72 hours,
translation.zh:
如果我们72小时内
在布拉加的案子上还没进展

translation.en: they're gonna shut us down.
translation.zh:
如果我们72小时内
在布拉加的案子上还没进展 我们就都下岗了

translation.en: Well, I know I'm a newbie here, but why the clock now?
translation.zh:
我知道我是新来的
但是为什么那么急

translation.en: Because it's been two years,
and the last three agents we sent in to infiltrate his organization...
translation.zh: 我们派去卧底的三个探员

translation.en: have come back in body bags.
translation.zh:
都裹着尸袋回来的 他运入境的海洛因
比埃斯科巴10年的都多

translation.en: He's moved more heroin across the border than Escobar did in 10 years.
translation.zh:
他运入境的海洛因
比埃斯科巴10年的都多

translation.en: This guy is becoming one of our biggest national threats,
translation.zh: 这家伙成为国家最大的威胁之一

translation.en: and we don't even have a picture of him.
translation.zh: 我们连他的照片都没有

translation.en: We don't have prints! Not even a goddamn D.O.B.
translation.zh: 没有指纹 连出生日期都不知道

translation.en: What's the status on David Park?
Isn't he our ticket into the Braga organization?
translation.zh: 他是我们潜入布拉加组织的通行证

translation.en: We're running the name through city and county databases, sorting the possibilities.
translation.zh: 我们通过数据库搜索 按可能性排序

translation.en: We've got over 500 already.
Park's insignificant. Sounds like another jerk-off to me.
translation.zh: 帕克不重要 对我来说就是个小混混

translation.en: It's not. Without Park, Braga wouldn't have drivers to move his shipments.
translation.zh: 不是的 没有帕克介绍 布拉加不会让车手给他送货

translation.en: Cross-check traffic-- illegal modifications, street racing.
translation.zh:
监视交通 非法改装 街头赛车 这家伙肯定有记录
我们会抓住他

translation.en: This guy will definitely have a record. We'll find him.
translation.zh:
街头赛车 这家伙肯定有记录
我们会抓住他

translation.en: We better.
Well, what do you know?
Your boy Toretto's red Chevelle's been spotted in his old neighborhood.
translation.zh:
你那小子特伦托的红色雪佛兰
在他家附近出现

translation.en: I'm gonna bring his ass in.
Not in your car you're not.
It's straight ahead.
You found something back there.
There were burn marks on the ground.
The kind that could only be caused by nitrometh.
translation.zh: 只可能是硝基甲烷造成的

translation.en: There's only one guy in all of L.A. that sells that.
translation.zh: 洛杉矶只有一家卖这个

translation.en: Nothing you can do is gonna bring her back, Dom.
translation.zh: 无论怎样她都不会复生 多姆

translation.en: If I were Letty, I would ask you-- no, I would beg you--
translation.zh: 如果我是莱蒂 我会要你… 不 我求你 忘掉它吧

translation.en: please, let this go.
translation.zh: 不 我求你 忘掉它吧

translation.en: Before it's too late.
It's already too late.
I love you.
Miss Toretto.
I'm, uh, Michael Stasiak, F.B.I.
translation.zh:
我叫迈克尔·斯特萨克
联邦调查局的

translation.en: Let's you and I have a little chat.
Hi. This is Forsythe in Evidence.
I need Stasiak down here right away to sign some greenies.
translation.zh: 我要斯特萨克来登记证人

translation.en: Thanks. Hi.
Hey. So, I've narrowed it down to 50 or so David Parks.
translation.zh: 我把范围缩小到50个大卫·帕克

translation.en: What I'd like you to do is run the make and model on each one of 'em.
translation.zh:
你要做的是查清他们每个的底细 –明白
–好的

translation.en: All right? Thank you. Okay. All right.
Hey, Tyler, we got a transfer.
translation.zh: 嘿 泰勒 我们换班了

translation.en: You want to come with me?
Toretto. When'd you get back in town?
translation.zh: 特伦托 你什么时候回来的

translation.en: I'm lookin' for a car you did an engine mod on.
translation.zh: 我在找一辆你改造过引擎的车

translation.en: Nitromethane tank. Ford full size. Continental tires.
translation.zh:
硝基甲烷油箱 福特全尺寸
大陆牌轮胎

translation.en: Okay, what are--What are you-- What are you doin', comin' in here like this, huh?
translation.zh:
听着 你在干什么
就这样大摇大摆地进来

translation.en: This ain't your scene anymore, boss.
translation.zh: 这不再是你的地盘了 老大

translation.en: Don't ever put your hands on me again, okay?
Say hi to your sister for me.
Korean kid brought it in. David Park.
translation.zh: 一个韩国小子 大卫·帕克

translation.en: It-- It's a green Ford Torino.
Please don't drop this on me.
I'm almost done.
Why don't you tell me why you dragged me here, Brian?
translation.zh: 告诉我 你为何带我到这来

translation.en: You know they're gonna capture Dom. Maybe worse.
translation.zh: 你知道他们要抓多姆 也许更糟

translation.en: I don't want you gettin' tangled up in this, so stay away from him.
translation.zh: 我不想你卷入这件事 所以离他远点

translation.en: That's what you have to say to me after five years?
translation.zh: 5年过了 这就是你要对我说的

translation.en: All of a sudden you care what happens to me.
translation.zh: 突然间 你开始关心我了

translation.en: What I did to you was wrong.
I'm sorry. It was-- It was the hardest thing I ever had to do.
translation.zh:
我很遗憾 那是…
我所做的最困难的事情

translation.en: I'm sorry too, Brian.
translation.zh: 我也很遗憾 布莱恩

translation.en: I'm so sorry that you had to come into my home and pretend to love me.
translation.zh: 我很遗憾你闯进我家 假装爱我

translation.en: I'm so sorry that you ripped my family apart.
translation.zh: 我很遗憾你把我家搞得四分五裂

translation.en: I'm very sorry that that was hard for you.
translation.zh: 我非常遗憾让你很为难

translation.en: I lied to you.
I lied to Dom. I lied to everybody.
translation.zh: 我对多姆撒谎 对所有人撒谎

translation.en: That's what I do best. That's why the feds recruited me.
translation.zh:
这是我拿手的
因此联邦调查局招我进去

translation.en: Maybe you're lying to yourself.
Maybe you're not the good guy pretending to be a bad guy.
translation.zh: 也许你不是装作坏人的好人

translation.en: Maybe you're the bad guy pretending to be the good guy.
translation.zh: 也许你是装作好人的坏人

translation.en: You ever think about that?
Every day.
I always wondered--
Why'd you let my brother go that day?
translation.zh: 那天你为什么让我哥哥走

translation.en: I don't know.
[ Sighs ] Shit.
Brian! I got the cross-checks on David Park back and have a list of possibles.
translation.zh:
布莱恩 我核查了大卫·帕克
列出了可能的名单

translation.en: What do you got?
Forty-five-year-old male in a six Scion with three reckless driving tickets.
No. An '01 Chevy Tahoe.
No. Two Mini Coopers-- a six and a seven.
translation.zh:
两辆Mini Cooper 06
和07款 丰田混合车

translation.en: A Toyota hybrid. Hell, no.
translation.zh:
两辆Mini Cooper 06
和07款 丰田混合车 不是

translation.en: '98 Saturn. A '95 Sebring.
A '98 Nissan 240 with an illegal mod. Wait.
translation.zh: 98款尼桑240 非法改装过 等等 就是它

translation.en: That's it. What?
translation.zh:
等等 就是它 –哪个
–非法改装的尼桑240

translation.en: The 240 with the illegal mod. How do you know?
translation.zh:
–哪个
–非法改装的尼桑240 –你怎么知道
–因为是我会开的

translation.en: Because that's something I'd drive.
translation.zh:
–你怎么知道
–因为是我会开的

translation.en: No, no, no, no, no!
Green Torino, runnin' nitro.
translation.zh: 绿色都灵车 烧硝基甲烷

translation.en: Whose car? I don't know, man.
I'm just the middleman, I swear. I'm just the middleman!
translation.zh:
我只是中间人 我发誓
我只是中间人

translation.en: Wait, wait, wait. [ Panting ]
I don't know shit, man. I swear.
translation.zh:
我不知道 我发誓
我只是给布拉加开车的

translation.en: I just run cars for Braga. All right?
translation.zh:
我不知道 我发誓
我只是给布拉加开车的 我能做的只有让你去参赛 就这些

translation.en: - All I can do is get you in the race. That's all I can do. - What race?
translation.zh: 我能做的只有让你去参赛 就这些 什么比赛

translation.en: Help! Come on, man! Let me up, man!
translation.zh: 救命 抓住啊 把我拉上去 快

translation.en: Come on!
Come on, man! I don't know shit! Just let me up!
translation.zh: 快点啊 我什么都不知道 拉我上去

translation.en: - I-- I told you, you gotta talk to Braga! - Bring him up, Dom.
translation.zh: 我说了 你要和布拉加去谈 把他拉上来 多姆

translation.en: Oh, God! Don't drop me! That's all I know!
translation.zh: 天啊 别放下我 我只知道这些

translation.en: Bring him up. Yeah, listen to him!
translation.zh: 把他拉上来 你来抓我的吗？ 奥康纳

translation.en: - You gonna take me in, O'Conner? - Oh, shit! Oh, shit!
translation.zh:
你来抓我的吗？ 奥康纳 –靠
–闭嘴

translation.en: Shut up!
Letty was my friend too. You weren't anyone's friend.
translation.zh: 莱蒂也是我的朋友 没有人是你的朋友

translation.en: Yo, can you guys talk about this later? Now pull my ass up!
translation.zh:
你们能不能以后再谈这个
快把我拉上去

translation.en: She was running for this guy Braga, and things went bad.
translation.zh:
她在为这个布拉加做事
后来出了情况

translation.en: Please! Oh, shit! I'm gonna get these guys, Dom.
translation.zh: 求求你 我要抓住这帮人 多姆

translation.en: Now let me do my job and bring him up.
translation.zh: 我要抓住这帮人 多姆 让我来做我的工作 把他拉上来

translation.en: I'm gonna kill this Braga--
Oh, God!
and anyone else who gets in my way.
Don't let go.
O'Conner!
O'Conner! If you ever release a witness of mine again--
translation.zh: 奥康纳 如果你再放走我的证人…

translation.en: - Shit. - That's enough!
- Don't touch me. I'm fine. - That's enough.
- You're through, O'Conner! - I said, that's enough!
Stasiak, go get yourself cleaned up.
Wh-What? He hit me first! You-- You--
translation.zh: 什么 他先打我的 你…

translation.en: This isn't the Cub Scouts!
Now, go on! You're bleedin' on my floor.
translation.zh: 快去 血滴到我的地板了

translation.en: O'Conner, do you know the difference between a cop and a criminal?
translation.zh: 奥康纳 你知道警察和罪犯的区别吗

translation.en: What? One bad judgment call.
Keep your shit in line, son.
Have a good time.
Take a seat.
Good news. We have intel that Braga's number two, Ramon Campos,
translation.zh:
好消息 内线说布拉加的二把手
雷蒙·坎波斯

translation.en: will hold a street race in Koreatown tomorrow night to fill a slot on his team.
translation.zh: 明晚要在韩国城举行街头车赛 为他的队伍选拔人才

translation.en: They've already chosen three drivers from previous races.
translation.zh: 他们从前面的比赛中已经选中三个

translation.en: Our newest informant, Mr. David Park,
translation.zh: 我们最新的线人 大卫·帕克

translation.en: has been kind enough to get us into the race.
translation.zh: 我们最新的线人 大卫·帕克 让我们能够进入比赛

translation.en: O'Conner, you're up.
Let me guess. Winner gets the slot.
All right. So these are all the imports the city has in impound.
translation.zh: 这就是本市扣押的车辆

translation.en: Okay, nice. Pick your poison.
All right. Uh, 2206. I crashed one of those.
Okay. So which one do you want?
I want 'em all.
Standard issue tracking device.
Boss wants to know where you are at all times.
translation.zh: 上头要一直知道你在哪

translation.en: You wanna play with this?
Hey! What you lookin' at, nutsack?
translation.zh: 嘿 你在看什么 脓包

translation.en: I don't know. You tell me.
Oh. The racer wants what Dwight's got.
translation.zh: 车手想要德怀特的东西

translation.en: See, but, ladies, Dwight's already on the team.
translation.zh: 但是姑娘们 德怀特已经入选了

translation.en: - 'Cause you gotta be fast if you wanna drive for Braga. - Is there a problem here?
translation.zh:
你要想给布拉加开车的话得快点 –有问题吗
–没有

translation.en: No.
- You one of Park's guys, blondie? - Yeah. Yeah, I am.
translation.zh: 你是帕克找来的吧 是的

translation.en: Follow me.
See you later, punk.
You too, punk.
Bull's-eye, coño. Come on.
Oh! We could do this all day. Dame, dame, dame, dame, dame.
You all know why you're here?
translation.zh: 你们都知道为什么到这来

translation.en: Good drivers...
are a dime a dozen.
translation.zh: 实在太多了 靠开车泡妞的人太多了

translation.en: Man, every corner's got a chingadera tuner racing for pinks.
translation.zh: 靠开车泡妞的人太多了

translation.en: That's not what Braga's got me looking for.
translation.zh: 那不是布拉加让我找的

translation.en: Braga wants someone that would sell their abuelita to be behind the wheel.
translation.zh: 布拉加要的是能把一切抛在脑后的人

translation.en: Someone that drives their 10-second cars not in a straight line,
translation.zh: 不是规规矩矩地开跑车

translation.en: but to push it and make it through places... no one else would take it.
translation.zh: 而是穿越没人能去的地方

translation.en: Real drivers, ¿entiendes?
So, what are we haulin'?
Oye, for the money Braga's paying, you don't need to know.
translation.zh: 布拉加付钱 你没必要知道

translation.en: You just said you wanted real drivers.
A real driver knows exactly what's in his car.
translation.zh: 真正的车手知道自己车里有什么

translation.en: Mira. Real driver.
Nobody's forcing you to race. You the boss?
translation.zh: 没人逼你去开车 你是老大

translation.en: Or am I talkin' to the boss?
Do I look like a boss?
Papi. My job is to find the best drivers... period.
translation.zh: 我的工作是找到最好的车手

translation.en: Whoever wins the race gets the info. We cool?
translation.zh: 谁赢得比赛谁就能知道 好不好

translation.en: Are we cool?
Yeah, we're cool.
Uh, no, we ain't cool, man.
Uh, who's closing these streets?
[ Chuckling ] No one. That's the point.
[ Female Computerized Voice ] Please wait while directions are downloaded.
translation.zh: 导路下载中 请稍等

translation.en: Proceed to the highlighted route.
Ten,
nine,
eight,
seven,
- six-- - You sure you want to do this?
translation.zh:
六… –你确定这么做
–很多事情变了

translation.en: five-- A lot has changed.
translation.zh:
–你确定这么做
–很多事情变了

translation.en: four-- You're right.
three,
two,
one.
Go!
[ Computer ] Right turn ahead.
You are now five miles from your destination.
How my ass look, Chia Pet?
translation.zh: 我的屁股怎么样 小子

translation.en: Ghetto Smurf.
Dead man drivin'.
Come on!
[ Computer ] Right turn ahead.
Oh, shit!
- Damn. - Rerouting.
translation.zh: 见鬼 重新计算路线

translation.en: [ Computer ] Rerouting.
Proceed straight ahead.
Rerouting.
Whoa, shit!
Rerouting. Would you shut up?
You are 2.6 miles from destination.
Oops. I didn't see you.
You are now four and one half miles from your destination.
U-turn if possible. Are you kidding me?
translation.zh:
–U型转弯 可能的话
–开玩笑吧

translation.en: You are now 4.2 miles from your destination.
Sorry, car.
You are now one mile from your destination.
Yeah! Guess who's back, Dom!
translation.zh: 猜猜谁回来了 多姆

translation.en: Let's go!
Nice car, baby!
Bitch!
You are now one quarter mile from your destination.
translation.zh: 距离目标四分之一英里

translation.en: Too early, Dom.
- No! - Still a buster.
- [ Whooping ] - You have reached your destination. Good-bye.
At least we know you can't beat me straight up.
translation.zh: 至少你不耍赖赢不了我

translation.en: - I didn't know there were any rules. - i'Tremendo, jefe!
translation.zh: 我不知道规则有这么一说

translation.en: i'Así me gusta! Now that's what I call real driving.
translation.zh: 这就是我说的真正的车手 胡说八道

translation.en: No, that's bullshit, man! Go cry to your mama, eh?
You work for Braga now.
translation.zh: 你现在为布拉加工作了

translation.en: When the G.P.S. calls, you follow.
translation.zh: GPS呼叫时 你就跟着走

translation.en: Driver's license. What driver's license?
translation.zh: 驾驶执照 什么驾驶执照

translation.en: - Thumb. - [ Beeping ]
Cell phone number.
The print's for Campos.
The number is for me.
Yo, nutsack! Let me tell you somethin', man.
translation.zh:
脓包 告诉你吧
那个肌肉男总能打败新来的

translation.en: Muscle beats import every time.
translation.zh:
告诉你吧
那个肌肉男总能打败新来的

translation.en: You know what I'm sayin'? Every time!
translation.zh: 你听清了 总能打败

translation.en: [ Laughing ] Ladies, let's get on back to Papa Dwight's. Come on.
translation.zh: 姑娘们 回到德怀特叔叔这来吧

translation.en: Papa Dwight wants you to take off your shoes.
translation.zh: 德怀特叔叔要你们脱鞋

translation.en: Come on. Dwight likes feet. Take off your shoes.
translation.zh: 德怀特喜欢美脚 脱鞋吧

translation.en: So beautiful.
[ Chuckles ] Oh, Dwight likes this foot a lot. Mmm!
Uh. Oh, yes, baby. [ Man Rapping ] ♪It's like that ♪
Mmm. Daddy Dwight loves your foot-- - F.B.I.! - [ Screams ]
Hey! Yo, what you doin'? I didn't do nothin', man! Dwight didn't do nothin'!
translation.zh: 我什么都没做 德怀特什么都没做

translation.en: Hey, yo, stay, stay! Where you goin'?
translation.zh:
–别走 你们去哪
–再见了 德怀特

translation.en: Bye, Dwight. Yo, what did I do? Ow!
You're under arrest for distribution of meth.
Meth? Dwight's never touched that shit, bro!
translation.zh: 毒品 我从不碰那玩意

translation.en: - Dwight has now. - Yo, that ain't mine!
translation.zh: 现在碰了 那不是我的

translation.en: No, get off me! You know that's never gonna stick, right?
translation.zh: 你知道这从来站不住脚的 对吧

translation.en: Ow! Yeah, it's not supposed to.
Live it up! Live it up!
Yeah. Corona.
That's too bad about Dwight.
Havin' the feds raid your house the same night you make the team.
translation.zh:
你进入他们组织那晚联邦调查局
搜查了他的房子

translation.en: That's unfortunate.
I wish I could say I was surprised to see you here.
translation.zh: 我想说我真没想到在这遇见你

translation.en: What's to stop someone from tellin' them you're a cop?
translation.zh: 怎样才能让我不告诉他们你是警察

translation.en: Probably the same thing that's keeping me from tellin' 'em why you're really here.
translation.zh:
和我不告诉他们你来这的目的
也是一回事吧

translation.en: What up, fellas? Hey, how you doin'?
Great. You havin' a good time?
Yeah, a great time. Come on. Let's have a better time.
How's your car? You took a nasty bump.
translation.zh: 你的车怎么样了 撞得不轻啊

translation.en: It'll be ready.
I also heard you just got out of County.
translation.zh: 我听说你刚从牢里出来

translation.en: Yeah? Mm-hmm.
You know a guy named Jim Garcia?
Nah. Big place. Lots of names, lots of faces.
translation.zh: 没有 地方大 很多名字 很多面孔

translation.en: And you-- You're wanted by a lot of people, homes.
Man, that kinda heat can't be good for business.
Yeah, well, that depends on how you look at things.
translation.zh: 那要看你怎么看这件事

translation.en: I go down, I do time.
I do real time.
I don't know about your other drivers,
translation.zh:
我不知道别人怎么样
只要我看到后面警车在追

translation.en: but when I see flashing lights in my mirror, I don't stop.
translation.zh:
我不知道别人怎么样
只要我看到后面警车在追 我可不会停

translation.en: Do you know each other?
He used to date my sister.
I see.
You're a lucky man.
- How's that? - You're still breathing.
translation.zh:
–你很走运
–怎讲 你还活着

translation.en: To the ladies we've loved and the ladies we've lost.
translation.zh: 为我们爱过和失去过的女人们干杯

translation.en: So, what's Braga about?
You know, he's just one of us.
Came up from the streets. Down for el barrio.
translation.zh: 发迹于街头 最后入狱

translation.en: Now he's a shot caller.
translation.zh: 现在他是发号施令的人

translation.en: The boss of bosses.
See all these cats in here? Mm-hmm.
Any one of 'em would die for Braga.
translation.zh: 他们都愿意为布拉加去死

translation.en: Including you?
Especially me.
Enjoy the party, fellas. Club's yours.
translation.zh: 好好玩 伙计们 这是你们的地盘

translation.en: Whatever you want-- booze, broads-- it's all good.
translation.zh: 不管你们要什么 美酒 佳人 都行

translation.en: Braga's mine.
I'm taking the whole house down.
Good luck.
Something interest you about this car?
Just admiring the body work.
Are you one of those boys who prefers cars to women?
translation.zh: 你是那种喜欢车胜过女人的人吗

translation.en: I'm one of those boys that appreciates a fine body regardless of the make.
translation.zh:
我是那种喜欢完美身形的人
不管是车还是女人

translation.en: Your car?
It's Fenix's car.
You met him at the rendezvous. He'll be leading you.
translation.zh:
你会在接头地点见到他
他给你们领路

translation.en: So now that I know your taste in cars,
translation.zh: 现在… 我知道了你对车的品味

translation.en: tell me, what about your women?
translation.zh: 告诉我 你的女人什么样子

translation.en: Well, it starts with the eyes.
translation.zh: 一切都是从眼睛开始的

translation.en: She's gotta have those kinda eyes... that can look right through the bullshit...
translation.zh: 她那双眼睛能穿过浮夸的外表

translation.en: to the good in someone.
Twenty percent angel, 80% devil.
translation.zh: 二分天使 八分魔鬼

translation.en: Down to earth.
Ain't afraid to get a little engine grease under her fingernails.
translation.zh: 一点都不怕指甲上沾上机油

translation.en: That doesn't sound anything like me.
It ain't.
Hi. Hey.
I got a gift for you. All right.
A dirty shot glass. Just what I always wanted.
translation.zh: 脏酒杯 我一直想要的

translation.en: I got these from the club last night.
translation.zh: 脏酒杯 我一直想要的 我昨晚从俱乐部弄来的

translation.en: There's two sets of prints. Run 'em both. I know one of these is Campos's.
translation.zh:
他们两个的指纹都在上面 我知道一个是坎波斯的
另一个很可能是布拉加的

translation.en: I think the other might be Braga's.
translation.zh:
我知道一个是坎波斯的
另一个很可能是布拉加的

translation.en: And you're gonna have to go beyond Interpol.
translation.zh: 你要联系国际刑警组织

translation.en: So that means I have to contact individual agencies, and that could take weeks.
translation.zh: 那意味着我要联系每一位探员 这要好几周时间 好吧

translation.en: Okay. [ G.P.S. Ringing, Vibrating ]
translation.zh: 这要好几周时间 好吧

translation.en: Yeah?
That's your third traffic violation in less than three blocks.
translation.zh: 不到3个街区你就3次违章了

translation.en: Slow it down, O'Conner.
Sure thing, Dad.
He's stopped.
We lost him.
- He killed the tracker. - We don't know that.
translation.zh:
–他关掉了跟踪器
–我们还不知道

translation.en: - He killed the tracker. - We don't know that yet! Get the bird overhead.
translation.zh:
–我告诉你 他关掉了跟踪器
–我们还不知道 出动直升机

translation.en: [ Pilot ] Right now I'm moving north 33-56.
All clear.
[ Pilot ] Base, Black Knight. I'm at Angels Five.
I don't have a tally on the target. Repeat: I don't have a tally on the target.
translation.zh: 没发现目标 重复 没发现目标

translation.en: - They're gone. There's no one down there. - Damn it!
translation.zh: 他们走了 那下面没人 混蛋

translation.en: This ain't right, bro. [ Car Doors Close ]
translation.zh:
这不对 老兄
没人说过被锁在卡车里

translation.en: Nobody said nothin' about being locked in no truck. Tell me about it.
translation.zh:
这不对 老兄
没人说过被锁在卡车里 怎么回事

translation.en: Hey. Hey!
Psst! Yo! Where you think they're takin' us?
translation.zh: 你认为他们带我们去哪

translation.en: Don't matter.
We're all just along for the ride now.
translation.zh: 我们现在只是凑热闹的

translation.en: Welcome to Mexico, boys.
translation.zh: 欢迎来到墨西哥 小伙子们

translation.en: There are helicopters and surveillance cameras...
that scan for heat signatures at the border,
but there are blind spots that I can guide you through via satellite.
translation.zh:
但是存在盲点
通过卫星我可以引导你们穿过去

translation.en: There can be no margin of error, so you must follow my every direction.
translation.zh:
绝对不能犯错
因此你们必须遵守指示

translation.en: Any questions?
I thought Fenix was gonna be here.
translation.zh: 我以为菲尼克斯会在这

translation.en: He'll meet you out there.
All right, everybody sync up.
Good luck, gentlemen.
[ Gisele On Radio ] Satellite link-up engaged.
Keep proceeding northbound at current speed.
translation.zh: 以当前速度前往北部边界

translation.en: Stay close to Fenix.
He'll lead you across.
I've got a heat signature northbound along Legardo Ravine.
translation.zh:
隆加多峡谷北侧
发现热信号

translation.en: Thermal imaging window on the Mexico side's gonna be down for about 45 seconds.
translation.zh:
墨西哥一侧的热信号窗口
45秒内会关闭

translation.en: Get the camera on it.
Manual override. Rerouting camera to designated coordinates.
translation.zh: 人工操作 设定摄像头到指定坐标

translation.en: [ Gisele ] Hurry it up. You guys have been tagged.
translation.zh: 快点 你们被盯上了

translation.en: Oh, shit.
[ Gisele ] Toretto, get back in formation.
translation.zh: 特伦托 获取背后情况

translation.en: Reimaging commencing.
I don't see anything. They're gone.
translation.zh: 什么都没发现 他们跑掉了

translation.en: Get the helicopters to cover it.
[ Pilot ] Uh, Base, we're 40 seconds out from Legardo Ravine.
translation.zh: 总部 我们离开隆加多峡谷40秒

translation.en: [ Gisele ] They're sending a helicopter.
[ Gisele ] You have 30 seconds.
[ Pilot ] North 32-33, west 116-49.
translation.zh:
北纬32度33分
西经116度49分

translation.en: [ Gisele ] The window's closing fast.
You need to get out of there before they send ground support.
translation.zh:
你们要在他们派出地面
支援之前离开

translation.en: [ Gisele ] Fifteen seconds.
[ Pilot ] Base, target is at two miles.
translation.zh: 总部 距离目标2英里

translation.en: [ Gisele ] You're running out of time.
[ Gisele ] You need to get out now!
Uh, Base, we're at, uh, north 32-33, west 116-49.
translation.zh:
总部 我们在北纬32度33分
西经116度49分

translation.en: We have no visual contact. Roll ground units for confirmation.
translation.zh: 没发现目标 出动地面部队以确认

translation.en: Sloppy!
Very sloppy!
What are you doin', man?
Come on. i'Pa'fuera! i'Salte!
Get out!
Come on, man. Come on, today, man. Come on, let's go.
translation.zh: 快点 快点 我们走

translation.en: [ Dom ] Yeah, yeah.
translation.zh: 快点 我们走 嘿 别碰我

translation.en: I said don't touch me, man. Hey, look, dog, don't put your hands on me.
translation.zh: 我说别碰我 把手从我身上拿开

translation.en: [ Man ] Hey, Malik, chill, bro.
Yo, man, what's up with your boy?
Hey, boss man!
What did you say?
I said only pussies run nitro-meth.
translation.zh: 我说只有脓包用硝基甲烷

translation.en: You looked under my hood?
I'm talkin' to you.
You got somethin' on your mind?
translation.zh: 在和你说话呢 你在想什么

translation.en: '70 Plymouth.
Her name was Letty.
Where's my money?
[ Dom ] And somebody wrecked her car.
I wrecked her car.
You remember her face?
'Cause I don't.
Last time I saw it, it was burning.
translation.zh: 上次我见到它 在燃烧着

translation.en: Now what?
I'm gonna enjoy what happens next.
translation.zh: 我会享受接下来这一刻

translation.en: Dom, get in!
Get in! Come on!
Get in the fuckin' car! Let's go! Hurry up!
[ Penning ] What have you got, Trinh?
We're contacting agencies in multiple countries.
translation.zh: 我们在联系各国的特工

translation.en: Unfortunately, most of them have to manually scan their prints for us to upload.
translation.zh:
很不幸 他们大多数都要手动
扫描指纹上传

translation.en: O'Conner's on line five. And, sir, you should see this.
translation.zh: 奥康纳在5号线 长官 您看看这个

translation.en: Thank you.
[ Beeps ] Talk to me, O'Conner.
Where the hell have you been? I got the shipment.
"I" got the shipment, or we got the shipment?
translation.zh: “我拿到货” 还是“我们拿到货”

translation.en: [ O'Conner On Speaker ] What are you talkin' about?
Traffic cams in the area picked up pictures of you and Toretto together.
translation.zh:
交通监视器录到
你和特伦托在一起的画面

translation.en: Listen to me, O'Conner. Bring in the shipment and bring in Toretto.
translation.zh:
奥康纳 给我听好 把货带来
也把特伦托带来

translation.en: But I thought the point was to get Braga. We got an opportunity here.
translation.zh:
但我认为目标是布拉加
我们现在有机会

translation.en: Brian, the clock's stopped ticking.
Bring them in. Are we clear?
translation.zh: 把他们带来 明白吗

translation.en: O'Conner? [ Phone Beeps ]
So this is what $60 million looks like.
We gotta get you to a doctor.
translation.zh: 嗯 你得去找医生看看

translation.en: We gotta find a place to hide this.
translation.zh:
我们要找个地方
把它藏起来

translation.en: I got a spot.
502, Wet Reckless. I need a 48-hour hold.
translation.zh:
502号 酒后驾车
需要48小时扣押

translation.en: Out back. Any spot you can find.
You sure about this?
Yeah.
translation.zh: 是的 他们最不会搜查的地方

translation.en: The last place they'll check: their own impound yard.
translation.zh: 是的 他们最不会搜查的地方 就是自己的押车场 相信我吧

translation.en: Trust me.
translation.zh: 就是自己的押车场 相信我吧

translation.en: I've been thinkin'. When you blew up your car back there, you blew up mine too.
translation.zh: 我在想… 你炸毁你的车的时候 把我的也炸了

translation.en: Yeah? Yeah.
So now you owe me a 10-second car.
Is that right? Yeah.
Now we're even.
This your way of keeping me away from him?
translation.zh: 这是你让我远离他的方式吗

translation.en: You're the only one I could call. He's my brother. Of course.
translation.zh:
–你是我唯一能求助的人
–他是我哥哥 当然

translation.en: Well, the bullet's not in there.
Gonna clean it and stitch it up.
translation.zh: 我要清洗干净然后缝上 会有点疼

translation.en: It's gonna hurt. I bet you're gonna enjoy this.
A little.
Want some of this? Yeah.
It's spicy. Be careful.
- You like it hot. - Mmm.
Dom, what are you doing? You reached first. You have to say grace.
translation.zh: 多姆 你怎么了 你太着急了 要先祈祷的

translation.en: Thank you, Lord, for blessing this table.
translation.zh: 感谢上帝 恩赐我们如此的一天

translation.en: With food... and family... and friendship.
translation.zh: 赐给我们食物 家庭和友情

translation.en: You asked me why I let Dom go.
translation.zh: 你问我为什么放走多姆

translation.en: I think it's because at that moment...
I respected him more than I did myself.
One thing I learned from Dom is that...
translation.zh: 我从多姆身上学到的是

translation.en: nothin' really matters unless you have a code.
translation.zh: 什么都不重要 除非你有准则

translation.en: And what's your code, Brian?
translation.zh: 你的准则是什么 布莱恩

translation.en: I'm workin' on it.
- Oh, shit. Hey, Dom-- - When were you gonna tell me?
translation.zh: 不好 嘿 多姆 你打算什么时候告诉我

translation.en: - Dom, what are you doing? - When were you gonna tell me you were runnin' Letty?
translation.zh: 多姆 你在做什么 你打算什么时候告诉我 是你在背后指使莱蒂

translation.en: - Let me explain. - When were you gonna--
- Dom, stop! Stop! - You don't understand.
translation.zh:
多姆 住手 –你不明白
–我不明白

translation.en: - I don't understand? - Stop!
translation.zh:
–你不明白
–我不明白 住手

translation.en: Shit!
Dom! Dom!
Dom, stop it! Please stop!
She did it for you, Dom! She did it for you.
translation.zh: 她是为了你 多姆 为了你

translation.en: Letty came to me to clear your name in exchange for bringing down Braga.
translation.zh: 莱蒂来找我要以为布拉加运货 来交换把你的名字从名单上除去

translation.en: She just wanted you to come home!
[ Yells ] I'm sorry, Dom! I'm sorry!
translation.zh: 对不起 多姆 对不起

translation.en: [ Sighs ] You better have one hell of an explanation. You disobeyed a direct order.
translation.zh: 你最好有个解释 你直接违抗命令

translation.en: Where's the shipment? It's safe.
"It's safe."
translation.zh: 安全 听者 我们可以拿这批货在媒体宣传

translation.en: Look, we could use the shipment to parade in front of the media,
translation.zh: 听者 我们可以拿这批货在媒体宣传

translation.en: get a few hundred pounds of heroin off the street,
translation.zh: 说是从街头查获了几百磅海洛因

translation.en: but Braga's just gonna send another shipment next week and the week after that.
translation.zh: 但是布拉加以后还会运更多的货进来

translation.en: Let's use the shipment to lure Braga out and lop the head off a multi-billion dollar cartel.
translation.zh: 我们用这批货把布拉加引出来 把他们的头抓住

translation.en: And how do you suggest we do that?
A hand-to-hand exchange with Braga.
- No, he'll never show. - He can't afford not to.
translation.zh: 他从不出现 他不得不露面

translation.en: You got a plan?
There's a price.
We bag Braga, you let Toretto walk.
translation.zh: 我们抓住布拉加 你放了特伦托

translation.en: [ Beeps ] Yes? It's Dom.
I was just thinking about you.
You know, when I gave you my number I was hoping you'd call.
translation.zh:
我给你我的号码的时候
希望你能打过来

translation.en: But not under these circumstances.
What circumstances? Me being alive?
translation.zh: 什么情况下 我活着

translation.en: Don't take it personally.
It's just business.
I got some business of my own.
Get Campos.
It's them.
Was that how Braga inspires loyalty? Killing his drivers?
translation.zh: 布拉加就这样表现诚意 卸磨杀驴

translation.en: One can always find more drivers.
It's just good business.
- I want to trade. - Braga doesn't negotiate.
translation.zh: 我要做笔交易 布拉加从不谈判

translation.en: [ Dom Chuckles ] Fine.
translation.zh: 好吧 你向他解释六千万的货怎么就不见了

translation.en: Then you explain to him how all of a sudden $60 million worth of product disappears.
translation.zh: 你向他解释六千万的货怎么就不见了

translation.en: I know that can't be good for business.
translation.zh: 我知道这对生意可不好

translation.en: What do you want?
Six million cash, delivered by Braga himself.
translation.zh: 六百万现金 布拉加亲自送过来

translation.en: [ Dom ] I don't like being shot at.
I ain't gonna put my neck out again unless he's got somethin' to lose too.
translation.zh:
我可不想冒生命危险
除非他也冒险前来

translation.en: - He'll never go for it. - Either I deal with Braga, or you do.
translation.zh: 他不会来的 或者我和布拉加打交道 或者你去

translation.en: When and where?
Sir, players are on site. Holding positions at the perimeter.
translation.zh: 队员已经就位 周围待命

translation.en: All right, listen up. Everybody stay frosty.
We don't move a muscle until O'Conner gives the signal.
translation.zh: 接到奥康纳信号前不得行动

translation.en: When he gets the money, you know what to do.
translation.zh: 他拿到钱的时候 我们知道该怎么办

translation.en: Well, the good news is, when we get this guy, you walk outta here a free man.
translation.zh: 好消息是 我们抓住这家伙时 你就自由了

translation.en: Is that what they told you?
Yeah, that's the deal.
You still put milk and cookies out for Santa Claus?
translation.zh: 你还信圣诞老人这回事

translation.en: [ Chuckles ] Yeah.
translation.zh: 你还信圣诞老人这回事 是啊

translation.en: Here. In case things go shitty.
Just like old times? Yeah.
Oye. You dropped something.
That's what you wanted, right? Toma! No, no, hey, Dom.
He's harmless. Don't worry about him.
And he's really sorry about Letty.
Where's our stuff?
You mean the stuff that used to be in here, right?
Well, you'll see it when we see Braga. That was the deal.
translation.zh:
我们见到布拉加
你就能见到货 这是协议

translation.en: No worries.
Braga keeps his word.
Two million.
You get the rest when I get my property.
translation.zh:
拿到我的东西后
再给你们剩下的钱

translation.en: Stasiak. [ Trinh ] We got a match.
Fingerprint's Braga's a hundred percent.
Just waiting on facial confirmation via fax.
[ Brian ] I got a question for you.
Were you wearin' pink when you were clawin' your way out of el barrio?
translation.zh: 你越狱时候穿的是粉的

translation.en: Order all agents to move in. We got confirmation.
translation.zh:
所有特警准备行动 我们得到确认
头号疑犯身着灰色西装

translation.en: Primary suspect wearing gray suit. Let's move.
translation.zh:
我们得到确认
头号疑犯身着灰色西装 行动

translation.en: Sir, O'Conner hasn't given us the signal yet.
translation.zh:
长官 奥康纳还没给出信号 你哪部分不明白
我们刚得到确认 快行动

translation.en: What part of that didn't you understand? We just got confirmation. Do it!
translation.zh:
你哪部分不明白
我们刚得到确认 快行动 头号疑犯身着灰色西装 重复

translation.en: Secure primary suspect in gray suit.
translation.zh: 头号疑犯身着灰色西装 重复

translation.en: Repeat: Secure primary suspect in gray suit.
translation.zh: 头号疑犯身着灰色西装

translation.en: You're thinking what I'm thinkin', right?
translation.zh: 你和我有同样的想法 对吧

translation.en: He ain't Braga.
- Oh, shit. - Drop your weapons!
translation.zh: 糟糕 放下武器 联邦调查局的

translation.en: - F.B.I.! - Get down!
translation.zh: 放下武器 联邦调查局的 趴下

translation.en: Get outta here!
Get outta here, Dom!
[ Engine Revving ] Run 'em down.
Go! Hey! Campos is Braga!
translation.zh: 快走 坎波斯就是布拉加

translation.en: - Come on. - i'Al otro lado!
Approaching primary target.
Primary suspect is secure.
Get up. [ Man ] He was under your nose the whole time.
translation.zh: 全程他都在你们鼻子底下

translation.en: Now Braga's escaped,
Toretto's heading south, probably long across the border by now.
translation.zh:
特伦托向南边跑了
很可能越过了边界

translation.en: - You have any idea the kind of trouble you're in,O'Conner? - I was doin' my job.
translation.zh:
你知道你惹了什么麻烦吗
奥康纳先生 我在做我的工作

translation.en: Wouldn't be the first bad guy you helped escape the law's grasp.
translation.zh:
他不是第一个你协
助逃脱法律制裁的人

translation.en: As of now, you're being taken off active duty...
until this office can mount a formal inquiry.
What about Braga?
That's no longer your concern.
We now know where Braga is, right?
translation.zh: 我们知道了布拉加在哪

translation.en: Customs tracked him via satellite to his home base in Tecale, Mexico.
translation.zh:
海关通过卫星追踪他到他的老巢
墨西哥的台卡利

translation.en: Mexico is out of our jurisdiction.
translation.zh: 我们在墨西哥没有执法权

translation.en: The fact is, the brass'll be so busy holding press conferences over the seizure,
translation.zh:
事实是 官员们忙着召开新闻发布会
解释这次抓捕

translation.en: we'll skate under the radar.
I thought we signed on to do the right thing.
translation.zh:
我以为我们的工作是
做正确的事情

translation.en: Everyone's looking for you.
I'm right here.
It's nice to see you've gone with the times and switched to electronic fuel injection.
translation.zh: 庆幸你走出低潮 换成了电子燃料注入 看上去不错

translation.en: Looks good.
translation.zh: 换成了电子燃料注入 看上去不错

translation.en: Buster became a gearhead.
I'm goin' with you.
I don't plan on bringin' anyone back.
translation.zh: 我没打算带任何人回来

translation.en: I know.
Hit that throttle.
How do you say good-bye to your only brother?
translation.zh: 要怎样和你唯一的哥哥道别

translation.en: You don't.
I thought you weren't gonna show up.
You saved my life.
I'm willing to return the favor.
This will help get you to Braga.
Dom.
Going in there is suicide.
I have no choice.
You must have loved her very much.
This is where my jurisdiction ends.
translation.zh: 我的权力到这就结束了

translation.en: And this is where mine begins.
You ain't forgiven.
You boys want to arrest me?
translation.zh: 你们要逮捕我 在这里

translation.en: No, we're beyond that.
You can't buy your way outta this one.
Hermano, you and me--
you and me, we not so different.
translation.zh: 你和我 没什么不同

translation.en: You're no hero.
You're right.
And that's why you're going back across the border.
[ Handcuffs Ratcheting ] But Fenix is mine.
You got it.
Shit.
You'll make it a couple of miles out, if you're lucky.
translation.zh: 如果你能跑出两英里 算你走运

translation.en: You know where you going?
You want to borrow my G.P.S.?
- [ Laughing ] - Where are your boys at?
- They gonna show up or what? - [ Machine Gun Fire ]
Careful what you ask for.
Just stop. Just stop the car.
Right behind you.
Dom, head to the tunnel. Let's use the tunnel.
translation.zh: 多姆 前往隧道 我们利用隧道

translation.en: Get outta here, Brian.
You sure you know where the tunnels are? You sure?
translation.zh: 你确定知道隧道在哪 确定吗

translation.en: Yeah, I'd hold on.
This might hurt.
You're in my world now, baby!
translation.zh: 现在到我的地盘了 宝贝

translation.en: That's it, baby. End of the road.
translation.zh: 就这样 宝贝 前面没路了

translation.en: Now what?
- Oh! Game over. - No, no, no, no.
Come on!
Get me outta here! [ Coughing ]
Pussy.
Let me see that.
Yeah, just keep pressure there.
[ Sirens Wailing ] You'll be all right.
You gotta get outta here.
I ain't runnin' anymore.
I gotta ask you something.
Yeah?
You know I would've-- I would've won that race if you didn't cheat, right?
translation.zh:
你知道如果你不作弊
那次赛车我就赢了 对吧

translation.en: You hit your head hard.
Don't make me laugh.
All rise.
Please be seated.
Please rise, Mr. Toretto.
translation.zh: 请起立 特伦托先生

translation.en: I've listened to the testimony...
and taken into special consideration...
Agent O'Conner's appeal of clemency on behalf of Mr. Toretto,
translation.zh: 奥康纳探员为特伦托先生的请愿

translation.en: that his actions directly resulted...
translation.zh: 他的行为直接导致大毒枭

translation.en: in the apprehension of known drug trafficker Arturo Braga.
translation.zh: 他的行为直接导致大毒枭 阿图罗·布拉加的逮捕

translation.en: However,
this judiciary finds that...
one right does not make up for a lifetime worth of wrongs,
translation.zh: 一件正确的事不能弥补一生犯下的错

translation.en: and as such I find that I am forced to level...
translation.zh: 因此 我不得不按加州法律判最终刑期

translation.en: the maximum sentence under California law.
translation.zh: 我不得不按加州法律判最终刑期

translation.en: Dominic Toretto,
you are hereby sentenced to serve 25 years to life...
at the Lompoc maximum security prison system...
without the possibility of early parole.
This court is adjourned. [ Gavel Raps ]
♪I don't care if it's fat Put it all on me ♪
translation.zh: 电影里的改装车带有危险性

translation.en: ♪I can see that thing in them jeans ♪
translation.zh: 所有特技在受控的环境

translation.en: ♪She move slow, fast Step on the gas ♪
translation.zh: 与专业特技团队 在封闭的道路进行

translation.en: ♪Stop, go With your foot on the floor ♪
♪Green light, go ♪
translation.zh: 不可在外随意尝试任何的桥段
